name: I am Food
description:
Made for Mini Jam 38: Food
https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-38-food
Since this game starts by clicking, it may be a violation of the rules.
(That is a limitation of scratch 😥)

Controls:

  • Left and Right arrow - Move.
  • Up arrow - Bite.

Tips:

  • Don't eat porcupinefish.
  • The fish approaches as you move.
  • Take advantage of the combo bonus.

Aim to earn five stars!
Please comment your score (^o^)/

BGM:浜辺でやきそば
https://dova-s.jp/bgm/play11100.html
